snippet: People attending a show by an American group, Eagles of Death Metal, described sudden terror when gunmen burst into the Bataclan concert hall.
abstract: Survivors of terrorist attack at Bataclan concert hall in Paris recall horrific night that claimed lives of more than 100 innocent people; three of attackers reportedly blew themselves up, and one was shot dead by police.

byline.original: By ADAM NOSSITER and ANDREW HIGGINS
byline.contributor: Kimiko de Freytas-Tamura contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: People attending a show by an American group, Eagles of Death Metal, described sudden terror when gunmen burst into the Bataclan concert hall.

headline.main: ‘Scene of Carnage’ Inside Sold-Out Paris Concert Hall
headline.print_headline: Inside Sold-Out Concert Hall, a Siege and ‘a Scene of Carnage’
